Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

Klasse
Beschreibung
AllCaregiverPresenter
The AllCareGiverPresenter contains the entire logic of the caregiver view.
AllPatientPresenter
The AllPatientPresenter contains the entire logic of the patient view.
AllTreatmentPresenter
The AllTreatmentPresenter contains the entire logic of the treatment view.
Caregiver
Represents a caregiver

This class extends Person and adds caregiver-specific attributes such as telephone number, activity status, and a unique caregiver identifier (cgID).
CaregiverDao
Implements the Interface DaoImp.
ConnectionBuilder
A class for managing the SQLite database connection.
Dao<T>
Generic DAO (Data Access Object) interface defining basic CRUD operations for entities of type T.
DaoFactory
Factory class for creating DAO (Data Access Object) instances.

This class implements the Singleton pattern to provide a single shared instance for creating DAO objects with managed database connections.
DaoImp<T>
Abstract base implementation of the Dao interface providing common database operations.

This class provides generic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality for entities of type T.
DateConverter
Utility class for converting between String, LocalDate, and LocalTime.
Main
The main class of the NHPlus application.
MainWindowPresenter
The MainWindowPresenter class controls the main window layout and navigation.

It handles user actions from the main menu and loads the first view (patients, treatments, caregivers) into the center of the main BorderPane.
NewTreatmentPresenter
The NewTreatmentPresenter contains the entire logic of the new treatment view.
Patient
Represents a Patient

This class extends Person and adds patient-specific attributes such as date of birth, care level, room number and a unique identifier (pid).
PatientDao
Implements the Interface DaoImp.
Person
Abstract base class representing a person with a first name and a surname.
SetUpDB
Call static class provides to static methods to set up and wipe the database.
Treatment
 
TreatmentDao
Implements the Interface DaoImp.
TreatmentPresenter
The TreatmentPresenter contains the entire logic of the treatment view.
User
Represents a user of the system with a unique ID, username, and password.
UserDao
Implements the Interface DaoImp.
UserLoginPresenter
The UserLoginPresenter contains the entire logic of the User Login view.
